languages.text:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer gains +50 MP in the first round of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatening areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger attacks of opportunity during this round.

The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatening areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

languages.text:
装备者在战斗首{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}额外获得20点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。装备者在穿过威胁区域时，不会额外耗费移动点数。
此外，装备者在此轮进行移动时，不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

traits.locale_text:
装备者在战斗首{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}额外获得20点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。装备者在穿过威胁区域时，不会额外耗费移动点数。
此外，装备者在此轮进行移动时，不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

装备者在战斗首{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}获得+20{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。装备者在穿过威胁区域时，不会额外耗费移动点数。
此外，装备者在此轮进行移动时，不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text:
Персонаж получает +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в первом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} боя. В областях угрозы затраты ОП на движение не возрастают.
Также движение персонажа в этом раунде не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж получает +50 ОП в первом раунде боя. В областях угрозы затраты ОП на движение не возрастают.
Также движение персонажа в этом раунде не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

Персонаж получает +50 ОП в первом раунде боя. В областях угрозы затраты ОП на движение не возрастают.
Также движение персонажа в этом раунде не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

languages.text:
使用者は戦闘の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を20獲得する。この移動コストは脅威エリアによって減少することはない。
さらに、使用者の移動はこのラウンド中、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を発動しない。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は戦闘の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を50獲得する。この移動コストは脅威エリアによって減少することはない。
さらに、使用者の移動はこのラウンド中、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を発動しない。

languages.text:
El portador obtiene +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} en la primera {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g} del combate. Las zonas amenazadas no reducen su coste de movimiento.
Además, el movimiento del portador no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} durante esta ronda.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

traits.locale_text:
El portador obtiene +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} en la primera {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g} del combate. Las zonas amenazadas no reducen su coste de movimiento.
Además, el movimiento del portador no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} durante esta ronda.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} in der ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} des Kampfes. Seine Bewegungskosten werden durch bedrohte Bereiche nicht reduziert.
Außerdem löst die Bewegung des Trägers während dieser Runde keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} aus.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatening areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} in der ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} des Kampfes. Seine Bewegungskosten werden durch bedrohte Bereiche nicht reduziert.
Außerdem löst die Bewegung des Trägers während dieser Runde keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} aus.

Der Träger erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} in der ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} des Kampfes. Seine Bewegungskosten werden durch bedrohte Bereiche nicht reduziert.
Außerdem löst die Bewegung des Trägers während dieser Runde keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} aus.

languages.text:
Le personnage gagne +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat et les zones menacées ne réduisent pas le coût de ses déplacements.
De plus, ses déplacements ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant ce round.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat. Les zones menaçantes ne réduisent pas le coût de ses déplacements.
De plus, les déplacements de l'utilisateur ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant ce round.

Le personnage gagne +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat et les zones menacées ne réduisent pas le coût de ses déplacements.
De plus, ses déplacements ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant ce round.

De plus, les déplacements de l'utilisateur ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant ce round.

Le personnage gagne +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat et les zones menacées ne réduisent pas le coût de ses déplacements.
De plus, ses déplacements ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant ce round.
